title: Google Calendar Sync
description: Fix events not appearing on mobile, missing notifications, and shared calendar errors.

steps.title: Enable Sync in Settings
steps.instruction: On Mobile: Open Google Calendar app → Settings → Tap the account → Ensure 'Sync' is toggled ON.

steps.title: Check 'Other Calendars'
steps.instruction: In web browser: Check the sidebar. Ensure the checkbox for the specific shared calendar is checked/active.

steps.title: Refresh Calendar Browser
steps.instruction: Simply press F5. Calendar uses background push; if your tab has been open for days, it may lose its connection to the server.

steps.title: Verify Time Zone
steps.instruction: Calendar Settings → General → Time Zone. If your PC and Calendar time zones mismatch, notifications will fire at the wrong time.

steps.title: Clear Calendar Storage (Android)
steps.instruction: Phone Settings → Apps → Calendar → Storage → Clear Data. This forces a full re-sync from Google servers.
